content.rendered:
As Chief Surveyor for Asia Geoff is responsible for general oversight of H&M and Warranty Surveys. He has a Class 1 Master Mariner and Special Casualty Representative, with 20 years deep sea experience. Geoff has regularly attended H&M surveys (casualty & risk), P&I surveys (casualty & risk), warranty surveys such as tow approvals, voyage approvals, JH surveys, project cargoes and given regular consultancy and Legal support.

Discipline: Mariner
Specialism: Casualty consultation & Survey work
Expert Witness Expertise: Technical advice – grounding and subsea cables

Contact

Malaysia | +60 17751 6455
Singapore | +65 9298 6455
